usbank.title: US Bancorp. Inc
usbank.subtitle: Information Security Specialist - Officer
usbank.desc:
• Used Python and SQL to provide analytics and metrics from data sourced from several identity and access management tools used by the Bank.
  • Designed and implemented dynamic reporting dashboards (in Scala and NodeJS) to replace manually created CSV/Excel reports.
  • Wrote and maintained custom .NET (C#) libraries used by core applications in the Bank's implementation of Office365/Microsoft Azure.
  • Designed and implemented a NoSQL (MongoDB) solution for tracking application account metadata for all Bank applications.

teksystems.title: TekSystems
teksystems.subtitle: IT Contractor
teksystems.desc:
• Used Python to extract, transform and load data from SQL and flat file sources (text, CSV, JSON) into reporting tools used by executive management.
  • Wrote and optimized queries and store procedures to efficiently pull data out of various company/client databases.
  • Maintained and optimized Apache Pig script responsible for consuming XML and JSON log files and evaluating for use by Splunk.
  • Designed and maintained Express/NodeJS webservice for obtaining event log data

stthomas.title: University of St. Thomas
stthomas.subtitle: Student Technician
stthomas.desc:
• Assisted students, faculty and staff with both hardware and software administration tasks (account resets, mail/file quotas, etc.)
  • Assisted with the desgin of SSRS/SSIS packages to present data from a SQL database tracking loanable technology assets (laptops, projectors, etc.)

stthomas.title: University of St. Thomas
stthomas.subtitle: B.A. in Economics—B.A. in Political Science
stthomas.desc:
Selected Coursework:
  • Econometrics
  • Macroeconomic Theory
  • Game Theory
  • Cryptography
  • Programming with Data Structures and Algorithms
  • Political Behavior
  • Linear Algebra
  • Cybersecurity and International Relations

spark.label: Coming soon
spark.title: Twitter Sentiment Analysis Using Apache Flume and Spark
spark.desc: An implementation of Apache Flume, Hive and Spark to use collect and analyze Twitter posts.

resume.title: This Resume
resume.desc: As a way of demonstrating my abilities with Node and other related technologies (CoffeeScript + Express + Jade, specifically), I built this resume page. The app renders resume content stored in a MongoDB database. Check out the repo on github.

usbintern.title: U.S. Bank Internship Program
usbintern.subtitle: Mentor
usbintern.desc:
• Help ensure the program runs smoothly during the summer and serve as a point of contact for any intern questions related to the program itself, career development, or otherwise.
  • Assisted with conducting interviews with potential intern candidates.
  • Collaborated with the Bank college recruitment group to expand the internship program from Technology to a program covering all Bank departments.

usbiamconnect.title: U.S. Bank IAM Connect
usbiamconnect.subtitle: Application Development Advisor
usbiamconnect.desc:
• IAM Connect is a virtual team of developers, engineers and analysts working in both security and other development groups throughout the Bank.
  • Worked as an identity and access (IAM) advisor for the group to help foster robust communities of practice with respect to developing secure applications using the Bank's existing IAM infrastructure.
  • Assisted as point-of-contact for researching and developing proof-of-concepts related to new IAM technologies.
